snippet: If the votes go their way in the 11 elections for governor next week, Republicans could have their strongest statehouse hand in decades.
abstract: Republicans stand poised to win several of the 11 governorships up for election around country, which could give them the strongest statehouse hand in decades.
lead_paragraph: If the votes go their way in the 11 elections for governor next week, Republicans could have their strongest statehouse hand in decades.

headline.seo: Republicans in Position to Increase Edge in Governorships
headline.main: As Focus Turns Local, G.O.P. Is Poised to Increase Edge in Governorships
headline.print_headline: As Focus Turns Local, G.O.P. Is Poised to Increase Edge in Governorships
